aboutMe.title: About Me
aboutMe.text: Cross-functional Solution Architect with 4+ years of experience bridging technology, business strategy, and organizational systems. Proven ability to understand and optimize the intersection of code, business operations, and infrastructure. Expert in translating business needs into technical solutions while considering operational requirements, team dynamics, and scalable system architecture. Specializes in identifying organizational needs and designing technology solutions that serve business objectives, operational efficiency, and strategic growth.
